Adventure racing fast, furious and heavily armed opponents. This fast-paced addictive combat racing game, in which many different vehicles, weapons that can be upgraded to receive bonuses on the track, as well as a variety of changing the route.

Along with the development of his driving and fighting skills, player has to invest his hard earned money wisely to come to glory.
